title: A Week With Grandpa
description: A Week with Grandpa is the story of a little boy who spends seven fun-filled days with his grandfather. The days of the week are presented in sequential order, with the boy and his grandfather engaging in a different activity each day.
meta: Friday, Grandpa, Monday, Saturday, Sunday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand the text
Sequence Events : Sequence the events of a story
Segment Onset and Rime : Segment onset and rime
Days of the Week : Read the days of the week

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
